name: Floatlands Demo
description:
Story

Floatlands is a game where you get the power of the chosen to control two ancient objects. You must use those ancient objects to survive from your dangerous task to save the Chaos Island.

Can you save the Chaos Island or will you fail at your mission?

We would appreciate feedback or comments for our Demo build so we know what to change to our final Floatlands project.

This game has no saving system so you have to play it in a one go. We might add that feature in the future.

Even small donations help us to achieve Full version of this project.

(We recommend you to play the game on fullscreen and 1920x1080.)
